Dear {{profile.displayName}},

We have squeezed in greater rewards for you when you refer a friend to enjoy Shuga!


THAT'S NOT ALL!

Receive (1) Spin for every 4 successful referrals!

Get up to 30% of your referrals' Shuga earnings in their first 2 months. What does this mean?
  • WALK-INS: If your friend gets a total of 800 Shuga from Walk-ins, you get 240 Bonus Shuga (30% of 800 Shuga)!
  • SCANNING ITEMS: If your friend is a 'serial scanner' and accumulates 500 Shuga from scanning featured items, you earn 150 Bonus Shuga (30% of 500 Shuga)!
  • PURCHASE REBATE: Good on you if your friend is a shopaholic! Receive 10% of your friend's Shuga rebate.
    E.g. If your friend spends $100 at a partner store offering a 7% Purchase Rebate, he/she will receive 1400 Shuga rebate (worth $7). For doing absolutely nothing, you will receive 10% of her rebate which is worth 140 Bonus Shuga!

Start exploring our revised 'Refer-A-Friend' page in-app to keep track of all your referral activity! You can now send your friends reminders if you have yet to receive any Bonus Shuga from their Shuga activity!

Regards,
The Shuga Team
